    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bios_es_20070518_3_0030200</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bios_es_20070518_3_0030200</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Agentes geológicos externos I</string>
            <string language="en">External geologic agents I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Externe geologische Mittel I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Agents géologiques externes I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Agentes geologic externos I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Agenti geologici esterni I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξωτερικοί γεωλογικοί πράκτορες Ι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica los procesos geológicos externos. Se estudian los agentes atmosféricos, la meteorización, la formación de suelos, el viento, las aguas salvajes, torrentes y los ríos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining external geologic processes: atmospheric agents, weathering, soil formation, wind, runoff, torrents and rivers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das externe geologische Prozesse erklärt:
atmosphärische Mittel, Weathering, Bodenanordnung, Wind, 
Abfluß, Ströme und Flüsse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant des processus géologiques 
externes : agents atmosphériques, désagrégation, formation de 
sol, vent, écoulement, torrents et fleuves.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica processos geologic externos: 
agentes atmosféricos, weathering, formação do solo, vento, 
runoff, torrents e rios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega i processi geologici esterni:
agenti atmosferici, weathering, formazione del terreno, vento, 
scolo, torrenti e fiumi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τις εξωτερικές γεωλογικές 
διαδικασίες: ατμοσφαιρικοί πράκτορες, διάβρωση, 
εδαφολογικός σχηματισμός, αέρας, απορροή, χείμαρροι και ποταμοί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
